homePageTagline: Your one-stop online marketplace connecting businesses and customers across Rwanda.
findProductsDescription: Explore a wide variety of products from local Rwandan businesses. From electronics to fashion, food to furniture, find what you need with ease.
boostBusinessDescription: Are you a business owner in Rwanda? Register your shop, list your products, and reach a wider customer base. Grow with {{appName}}!
localFocusDescription: Dedicated to connecting Rwandan businesses with Rwandan customers.
easyToUseDescription: Intuitive platform for both buyers and sellers.
secureReliableDescription: Ensuring a safe and trustworthy marketplace experience.
loginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
allFieldsRequired: All required fields must be filled.
businessDetailsRequired: Business name, district, and sector are required for business owners.
noProductsFound: No products found matching your criteria.
productIDNotFound: Product ID not found in URL.
businessNeedsApprovalMessage: Your business needs to be approved by an administrator before you can post products or subscribe.
mustBeApprovedToSubscribe: Your business account must be approved by an admin before you can subscribe.
failedToFetchProductsOrSubscription: Failed to fetch products or subscription status.
subscriptionAndApprovalNeeded: You must have an active subscription AND your business must be approved by an admin to add or manage products.
noProductsPosted: You haven't posted any products yet.
confirmDeleteProductMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the product "{{productName}}"? This action cannot be undone.
fillAllRequiredFieldsAndUploadImage: Please fill in all required fields and upload at least one image.
ensureApprovalAndSubscription: Please ensure your business is approved by an admin and you have an active subscription.
noImagesSelected: No images selected. Please upload at least one image.
paymentSuccessful: Payment successful via {{method}}! Your subscription is now active.
businessNeedsApprovalToSubscribe: Your business needs to be approved by an administrator before you can subscribe.
selectPaymentMethod: Please select your preferred payment method
manageBusinessOwnerAccounts: Manage business owner accounts and their approval status.
confirmActionBusinessOwnerMessage: Are you sure you want to {{action}} "{{email}}" ({{businessName}})?
rejectedBusinessesWarning: Rejected businesses will not be able to post products or subscribe.
viewAndManageAllProducts: View and manage all products posted on the platform.
noProductsFoundOnPlatform: No products found on the platform.
addEditDeleteCategories: Add, edit, or delete product categories.
confirmDeleteCategoryMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the category "{{categoryName}}"? This action cannot be undone. Note: This will not automatically delete products associated with this category.
aboutUsParagraph1: {{appName}} is Rwanda's premier online marketplace dedicated to empowering local businesses and connecting them with customers across the country. Our mission is to foster economic growth by providing a user-friendly platform where entrepreneurs can showcase their products and reach a wider audience.
aboutUsParagraph2: We believe in the potential of Rwandan businesses and strive to create a vibrant digital ecosystem where shopping locally is convenient, reliable, and rewarding. Whether you're a small artisan, a growing retailer, or a service provider, {{appName}} is here to help you thrive.
ourMissionDescription: To empower Rwandan businesses by providing an accessible and efficient online marketplace, making local shopping easy and impactful.
ourVisionDescription: To be the leading e-commerce platform in Rwanda, known for its diverse product range, exceptional customer experience, and unwavering support for local entrepreneurs.
blogComingSoon: Our blog is coming soon! Stay tuned for exciting news, business tips, customer stories, and updates from {{appName}}.
